rules.modern: Low Hb with microcytosis + hypochromia + RDW↑ → likely Iron Deficiency Anemia (consider thalassemia trait differential).

ayur.text: Suggests Rasa–Rakta dhātu kṣaya, Vāta↑ / Pitta↓; address nidāna (alpāhāra, manda agni). After Āma reduction, consider Loha-kalpa.

guards.msg: Avoid iron preparations due to high ferritin.
Avoid iron preparations due to high transferrin saturation.

rules.modern: Hepatocellular pattern (ALT elevated, > AST). Evaluate drugs/viral/NAFLD; consider ultrasound if indicated.

ayur.text: Yakṛt duṣṭi with Pitta prakopa. Favor śītala/tiktā dravya; avoid guggulu.

guards.msg: Avoid guggulu and strong ushna drugs when ALT very high.

rules.modern: TSH>10 with low FT4 → Primary hypothyroidism likely.

ayur.text: Agni mandya with Kapha↑ Vāta↑ pattern. Begin with Dīpana-Pācana; avoid heavy guru dravyas initially.

guards.msg: High Āma: prioritize Dīpana–Pācana; delay heavy Rasāyana.
